remarks: The subtraction of elements in a subgroup is the same as subtraction in the group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
subgsubcl.p $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
subgsub.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
subgsub.n $e |- N = ( -g ` H ) $.
subgsub $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X N Y ) ) $.
